item.title: Session Notes: The Lost Mine
item.description: Date: 23 May 2021 Party Gregory. Human Cleric (Life) Aaravas. Half Elf. Paladin (Oath of the Ancients) Pio. Half Elf. Rogue (Arcane Trickster) Summary It was one of our longer sessions (3 hours) and a few interesting events happened. Last session the party had arrived in Phandalin back from a daring stealth rescue mission. They had managed to infiltrate the Cragmaw tribe’s stronghold deep in the treacherous Neverwinter Wood and take out their leader, King Grol, while rescuing their friend Gundren Rockseeker.

item.title: Welcome (back)!
item.description: I’ve lost count of the number of times I’ve redone my website over the years. This does not include the number of times I’ve switched between different blogging platforms and static website hosts. Hopefully, this iteration will last for a bit before I inevitably scrap it in favour of something else. Welcome back!

item.title: Reading List
item.description: 2021 The Last Wish - Andrej Sapkowski Going Postal - Terry Pratchett 2020 The Black Company - Glen Cook 2019 Rocket Men - Robert Kurson 2018 Bad Blood - John Carreyrou The Three Body Problem - Cixin Liu The Emperor of All Maladies - Siddhartha Mukherjee Small Gods - Terry Pratchett 2016 Being Mortal - Atul Gawande 2015 Hiroshima - John Hershey The Man Who Knew Infinity - Robert Kanigel The Martian - Andy Weir
